name: Mage Training Arena
description:
MTA screenshots guide:
1. Starting screenshot of points (click any item in shop to display points)
2. Any purchases you make
( >1 min after the starting sc, and >1 min before the ending sc: have chatbox open, make a purchase, then take screenshot. )
3. Ending screenshot of points

You do not need to end with more points than you started with!
